name: Autocoder
description: Execute AI coding agents to generate code from work items or prompts
author: Radu Gheorghiu

inputs.name: workItemId
inputs.label: Work Item ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Boards work item ID to use as context

inputs.name: userPrompt
inputs.label: User Prompt
inputs.helpMarkDown: Custom instructions for the AI agent

inputs.name: agentType
inputs.label: AI Agent tool
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the AI agent to use for code generation

inputs.name: apiKey
inputs.label: GitHub Personal Access Token or Claude API Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Personal Access Token for accessing GitHub Copilot (required if using GitHub Copilot agent), or API Key for Claude Code

inputs.name: containerImage
inputs.label: Container Image
inputs.helpMarkDown: Custom container image override. If not specified, the default image for the selected agent will be used.

inputs.name: createPullRequest
inputs.label: Create Pull Request
inputs.helpMarkDown: Automatically create a pull request with the generated changes

inputs.name: targetBranch
inputs.label: Target Branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target branch for the pull request

inputs.name: model
inputs.label: Model
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional model to use - For copilot: claude-sonnet-4.5, claude-haiku-4.5, claude-opus-4.6, claude-opus-4.6-fast, claude-opus-4.5, claude-sonnet-4, gemini-3-pro-preview, gpt-5.2-codex, gpt-5.2, gpt-5.1-codex-max, gpt-5.1-codex, gpt-5.1, gpt-5, gpt-5.1-codex-mini, gpt-5-mini, gpt-4.1 - For claude code: Provide an alias for the latest model (e.g. 'sonnet' or 'opus') or a model's full name (e.g.'claude-sonnet-4-5-20250929')). If not specified, the default model for the selected agent will be used.
